abcd:Representation.abcd:Title: Wikiplantbase #Sardegna
abcd:Representation.abcd:Details: The databases stores historical and current plant occurrence records relative to Sardinia administrative region of Italy (NUTS-2 code ITG2). Source of records may be bibliographical references, herbarium specimens, or human observations. The database is associated with the Wikiplantbase project, including sister databases for Tuscany, Liguria and Sicily

abcd:Representation.abcd:Text: Dipartimento di Scienze della Natura e del Territorio, Università di Sassari
